document.full_text: the musical 'spider-man: turn off the dark' resumed performances on broadway after an unusual, three-and-a-half week hiatus and creative overhaul.
document.title: revamped 'spider-man' returns, with more romance and more goblin
lines_and_colors: the musical 'spider-man: turn off the dark' resumed performances on broadway after an unusual, three-and-a-half week hiatus and creative overhaul.
